meanings.definition: Financial support or property settlement awarded to a former unmarried partner after a separation or breakup.
meanings.sent1: After their breakup, Sarah received palimony from her ex-boyfriend to help with her living expenses.
meanings.sent2: The court granted palimony to Mark's former partner to ensure she could maintain her standard of living.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was a joke, Tom promised to pay palimony to his best friend if they ever split up.
meanings.sent4: The palimony settlement was like a lifeline for Jane, providing her with the means to start anew.
meanings.sent5: The concept of palimony became clear to Jack when he saw how it helped his friend through a tough time.
